description: This film course focuses on the increasingly non-traditional ways of forming relationships in
the Nordic countries.  Rejecting the values of previous generations, young people from different
backgrounds and ethnicities form relationships according to their own integrity and sexual
preferences.  Students attain an understanding of these cultural trends and the technical
terminology to watch, read, think, talk, and write critically and intelligently about films as text.
fullname: Nordic Film Today: Love, Sex, and Family
